mapper.select: select a.umrid,a.umid,a.info,a.lastupdate,a.aid=#{loginAid} 'mine' ,b.username 'user.username',b.nickname 'user.nickname',c.img 'user.userInfo.img' from tb_user_message_reply a inner join tb_admin b on a.aid=b.aid inner join tb_user_info c on c.aid=b.aid where a.umid = #{umid} order by a.umrid

select a.umrid,a.umid,a.info,a.lastupdate,a.aid=#{loginAid} 'mine' ,b.username 'user.username',b.nickname 'user.nickname',c.img 'user.userInfo.img' from tb_user_message_reply a inner join tb_admin b on a.aid=b.aid inner join tb_user_info c on c.aid=b.aid where a.umid = #{umid} order by a.umrid limit 3
select umrid,umid,aid,info,lastupdate from tb_user_message_reply where umrid=#{umrid}
mapper.update: update tb_user_message_reply set info=#{info} where umrid=#{umrid} and aid=#{aid}
mapper.delete: delete from tb_user_message_reply where umrid=#{umrid} and aid=#{aid}
